Noot, I believe the intention is just that they're communicating through entanglement.  絡む does mean a relationship but it also more literally means an entanglement or entwinement.  It's after the two of them are entwined together that they actually start to really communicate their feelings.  I don't think it's anything more complicated than that, really.
Not bad but better than nothing.
Bland shit. Nothing much interesting here.
@NootDystopia Its just probably mean sex communication pretty much guessing from the plot, the guy can't be honest the same for the loli.

Kinda meh art, but cut story anywho. Title is a real puzzle tho. Seems even the translator struggled with it. The original title is 絡みけーしょん/Karami-cation (as in like communication). Karami basically means an entanglement which is another way to say relationship in Japanese. 

I honestly got no idea what this title is trying to say. Maybe its actually combining communication with karami, because he wants to be able to go back to communicating with her but instead just ends up in a relationship with her?
